trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: If the Brainstealer fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The brainstealer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Mindfulness
entries: The brainstealer can choose to not affect any number of creatures with his area of effect feature and spells.

trait.name: Creature Sense
entries: The brainstealer is aware of the presence of creatures within 5 miles of it that have an Intelligence score of 4 or higher. It knows the distance and direction to each creature, as well as each one's intelligence score, but can't sense anything else about it. A creature protected by a {@spell mind blank} spell, a {@spell nondetection} spell, or similar magic can't be perceived in this manner.
Additionaly the brainstealer gains the following traits against creatured perceived by this feature:
{@i 1. } The brainstealer can target sensed by spells that requires a creatures to be seen.
{@i 2. } Sensed creatures gains no advantage for not being seem by the brainstealer.
{@i 3. } The brainstealer can make opportunity attacks agains sensed creatures despite not being able to see them.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Brainstealer uses it Frightful Presence then cast 2 different spells

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the Brainstealer's choice that is within 120 feet of the Brainstealer and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.  If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc} 15) and takes 9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) psychic damage at the start of each of its turns until the grapple ends. The brainstealer can have up to five targets {@condition grappled} at a time.

action.name: Extract Brain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}59 ({@damage 10d10 + 4}) piercing damage, plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) psychic damage.if the damage reduces the target to 0 hit points , the brainstealer kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

legendary.name: Tentacle
entries: The brainstealer dragon makes a tentacle attack.

legendary.name: mind blast (Cost 3 Action)
entries: The Brainstealer magically emits psychic energy. Creatures of the Brainstealer's choice within 60 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Intelligence saving throw or take 32 ({@damage 5d10 + 5}) psychic damage and be {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

legendary.name: Break Concentration
entries: The brainstealer targets a creature it can sense. The creature has to succeed on a {@dc 26} Constituition saving throw or lose its concentration on spells.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psyonics)
headerEntries: The elder brain's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 22}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

mythic.name: Mind Overload
entries: Every single creature within the brainstealer's lair has to succeed on a {@dc 26} Constitution saving throw or lose its concentration on spells.

reaction.name: Mind Carapace
entries: When a creature moves within 15 feet of the brainstealer it can cast {@spell antilife shell} as a reaction requiring no concentration. The spell lasts until the beginning of the brainstealer next turn.
